sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: Check the MAC against the Computer and Network Adapters table to see if there's an extreme amount of duplication. If there is, it's likely a virtual adapter and is ineligible for linking.

We do this by giving it a weight according to some context factors. var weight = 0; //Weight factor #1: in the 10.0.0.0/8 subnet if (inputs.ip_address != null) { if (inputs.ip_address.substring(0,3) == "10.") { weight += 1000 } } //Weight factor #2: Local area connection if (inputs.network_adapter_name != null) { if (inputs.network_adapter_name == "Local Area Connection") { weight += 1000 } } //Weight factor #3: Fewest duplicates possible weight += -100 * num_matches outputs.weight = weight })(inputs, outputs); 71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b adapters_count 38ad99041b1194107e280d43cd4bcbca 3244578 2020-06-04 17:17:13 81add9041b1194107e280d43cd4bcb03 0 3244578 2020-06-04 17:17:13 var__m_sys_hub_step_ext_input_38ad99041b1194107e280d43cd4bcbca
